q: . Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer raised the issue of piracy directly to Hu Jintao at a meeting with chief executives, according to Barack Obama 's account of the talks. Hu Jintao said he and Barack Obama agreed to work toward a cooperative partnership based on mutual respect and mutual benefit and that`` a lot still needs to be done in China in terms of human rights.'' shots and Allen Iverson scored 47 points as the Philadelphia 76ers beat the Atlanta John Two-Hawks 108-103 Friday night. The John Two-Hawks have lost 10 straight, including nine since trading Dikembe Mutombo to Philadelphia in a five-player deal on Feb. 22. I kept running into them and they kept telling me they were going to dunk on me, said Dikembe Mutombo , who is living at the same hotel that Atlanta stayed at in downtown Philadelphia.`` I kept telling them during the course of the game,` Why are you even trying?'' ... It just[ felt] negative.'' The` Just Go With It' star was referring to past seasons that included the outspoken Simon Cowell at the judges' table. Oprah Winfrey defended him, saying, I'm a Simon Cowell fan and what I thought is that Simon Cowell had a way of speaking the truth that was saying what you wanted to say but you wouldn't actually say it. She added,`` I will say that it's a kinder, gentler[ show now.]''
